title: Pectis longipes
text: Pectis longipes (Longstalk cinchweed) is a summer blooming <a href="perennial%20plant">perennial plant</a> and is a genus of <a href="pectis">pectis</a>. Its floral region is in the <a href="US">US</a> states of <a href="Arizona">Arizona</a> and <a href="New%20Mexico">New Mexico</a>.
